last_episode_to_air.name: Declan’s Choice
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the bikers make trouble for the Cosoletos, Nellie’s deal with a key witness hits a setback. Indiscretions in his own camp come back to bite Declan.

name: Bad Blood
overview: A dramatization of the life and death of Montreal mob boss Vito Rizzuto.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: This sprawling crime drama follows the true story of the Rizzuto family and its associates, who presided over organized crime in Montreal for decades.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: After a hard-fought power struggle in Montreal, Declan emerges victorious. But a powerful new presence from abroad soon poses a new threat.

episodes.name: Scar Tissue
episodes.overview: An old crime comes back to haunt mob boss Vito Rizzuto.

episodes.name: Pacifier
episodes.overview: Declan learns filling in for the boss is harder than he thought.

episodes.name: Feast or Famine
episodes.overview: The family gets Nico Jr. to relent in his quest to fill his father´s place, but the Rizzuto´s enemies still keep coming after them.

episodes.name: Home Is Where the Gun Is
episodes.overview: After returning from prison, Vito invites Declan back and declares war on everyone.

episodes.name: When You Got Nothin
episodes.overview: Vito and Declan set out to clear the board of its enemies.

episodes.name: You Can Never Hold Back Spring
episodes.overview: It seems Vito has emerged the clear winner in the gang wars, but there are still secret enemies lying in wait.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: This sprawling crime drama follows the true story of the Rizzuto family and its associates, who presided over organized crime in Montreal for decades.

episodes.name: Who Are You?
episodes.overview: In the wake of a bloody gangland war, Declan assumes sole control of Montreal's drug trade. But new arrivals from Italy complicate matters.

episodes.name: A Grapefruit Worth 20 Millions
episodes.overview: Feeling the squeeze on a debt owed to the cartel, Declan pushes back on his new competitors. Splintering loyalties start to destabilize the status quo.

episodes.name: Una Vita Per Una Vita
episodes.overview: Families don't get touched. At least that used to be the rule. But when the other side breaks it, Declan reciprocates by shattering it completely.

episodes.name: This Ship Has Sailed
episodes.overview: Nats and Valentina each deal with the consequences of their actions. Declan's smooth pathway through the ports hits a major snag.

episodes.name: Disruption and Early Sorrow
episodes.overview: Teresa and Christian's burgeoning fentanyl business causes major collateral damage for Rose. Valentina's confession comes back to haunt her.

episodes.name: What to do About Valentina?
episodes.overview: As word of Valentina’s dilemma spreads, tension within the Cosoleto family grows. Teresa and Christian try a new tactic to undermine Declan.

episodes.name: Lupara Cosoleto
episodes.overview: Declan ratchets up the heat on the Cosoletos and continues to pursue Teresa and Christian. The gift Declan promised is delivered to Nellie.

episodes.name: Declan’s Choice
episodes.overview: As the bikers make trouble for the Cosoletos, Nellie’s deal with a key witness hits a setback. Indiscretions in his own camp come back to bite Declan.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: After a hard-fought power struggle in Montreal, Declan emerges victorious. But a powerful new presence from abroad soon poses a new threat.
